titles.title: Domestic Violence Community Initiative Act of 1993

To amend the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to administer a Federal demonstration program to coordinate response and strategy within many sectors of local communities for intervention and prevention of domestic violence.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2503)
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Education and Civil Rights.

bill.summary: 10/21/1993--Introduced. Domestic Violence Community Initiative Act of 1993 - Amends the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide grants to nonprofit private organizations to establish local community intervention and domestic violence prevention projects. Authorizes appropriations.
